attributes.action: Raise the "child fare" age to 18 for buses and trains
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
I cannot vote until I am 18.
I cannot buy cigarettes and alcohol until I am 18.
I cannot fight for my country until I am 18.
I am not accepted as an adult until I am 18, but I and thousands of other teenagers across the country have to pay an adult bus and train fare. National Rail deem it reasonable to charge a 16 year old an adult train fare, vene though they're most probably still studying for their GCSEs. Arriva deem it reasonable to charge a 16 year old an adult bus fair. 

I do not deem this reasonable, I am currently studying towards my A Levels, I am 16 and I pay £43 a month just to get to and from my school which is only 3 miles away! We need to change this! It is ridiculous.
